title: Which is better, a Hummer electric super truck or a Tesla Cybertruck? - Quora

response.answer_text: Musk has admitted that the cybertruck will not be made because it is too large and won’t even fit in a garage. He said they will begin working on a smaller more conventional truck but now he has to start from a clean sheet of paper. Most automotive designs take 3-5 years to go from initial concept to consumer-ready production units. Most manufacturers have models on a 4-6 year "remodel circuit" which means they will undergo a major remodeling in look and powertrain every 4 to 6 years. Unfortunately, Musk has decided to not remodel the S/X lines after 8 years. As far as the Hummer is concerned, full scale mass production is only a year away and it is a very impressive “super truck” with prices starting at $70,000. Check out the “Reveal” video released by GM today. Watch The 2022 GMC Hummer EV Reveal Right Here: Video Tesla has totally missed the boat as Rivian, Ford and Chevy will also beat them to market. Musk should have had a mid-sized mass market pickup on the market 3 years ago.
